module.name: Wake Up Calls
module.description: FreePBX module for generating reminder and wakeup calls
module.changelog: *13.0.1alpha2* More Visual changes *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Styling Fixes *2.11.3* Fixes outstanding database issues *2.11.2* Database abstraction layer fixes *2.11.1* #7011 fix errors in hotel wakeup *2.11.0.0beta2* Removed online check for updates for POSSA *2.11.0.0beta1* imported from web to online repo
